# UpToPeriodsType

Unit of time that the charge duration is measured in. Only applicable if the value of the `endDateCondition` field is `Fixed_Period`. 

## Enum

* `DAYS` (value: `'Days'`)

* `WEEKS` (value: `'Weeks'`)

* `MONTHS` (value: `'Months'`)

* `YEARS` (value: `'Years'`)

* `BILLING_PERIODS` (value: `'Billing_Periods'`)
